comments:
Description: NullPointerException is thrown out when exporting a report file to a library.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Right click on a report name in outline view and select "export".
2. Select a library file name in file browser dialog.
3. Click on "OK". Error message pops up.
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException: Caused by java.lang.NullPointerException

Looks like it is the same bug with library includes library NPE bug.
